mapper.sql: id, parent_id, permission_type, permission_name, permission_code, path, component, icon, api_url, api_method, sort_order, visible, status, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.permission_code FROM user u JOIN user_role ur ON ur.user_id = u.id JOIN role r ON r.id = ur.role_id JOIN role_permission rp ON rp.role_id = r.id JOIN permission p ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE u.username = #{username} AND u.deleted = 0 AND r.deleted = 0 AND (r.status = 1) AND p.deleted = 0 AND (p.status = 1)
